summary: The commands package defines a framework for building and registering command‑line tools for the Diffusers library and implements specific utilities such as an environment inspector and a model conversion helper that downloads checkpoints, converts them to half‑precision, and optionally saves them in safetensors format.
business_intent: Enable users to interact with the Diffusers ecosystem via a unified CLI, offering diagnostics of the runtime setup and streamlined workflows for preparing model checkpoints in optimized formats.
